item.title: A Quest to Understand Green's Theorem
item.description: Introduction Green’s Theorem never really made sense to me. My first introduction to Green’s Theorem was in my first sememester of university in a course called Calculus of Several Variables. The statement of the theorem wasn’t overly complicated, but I just couldn’t put it all together and see the big picture. A couple years passed without seeing it again. Most of my coursework in this time was more focused on CS courses, Algebra, and intro-to-proof type courses.
